feed.title: Heimdall Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Heimdall: v2.5.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed #958 by @filipefumaux in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1080
  • fix: Add more error handling for app test by @keriati in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1111
  • fix: Update jquery, jquery-ui by @keriati in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1113
  • Update Korean language. by @angrystar170 in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1116
  • use jquery-sortablejs instead of jquery-ui by @dairidong in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1115
  • fix language setting only available in view by @dairidong in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1117
  • Added Ukrainian translation by @ShiftHackZ in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1125
  • fix: Route titlecolour error by @dairidong in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1126
  • Update Chinese language. by @dairidong in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1124

New Contributors

  • @filipefumaux made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1080
  • @dairidong made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1115
  • @ShiftHackZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1125

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/compare/v2.5.5...v2.5.6

entry.title: New release for Heimdall: v2.5.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add issue-pr workflows by @aptalca in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1147
  • handle issue-pr close and review submitted actions by @aptalca in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1150
  • fix sortable tooltip by @dairidong in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1130
  • Remove register route by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1163
  • Add Trianglify background option to the 2.x branch by @ullbergm in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1158
  • fix: Remove mix from trianglify.js by @keriati in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1166
  • fix: validate icons to be images by @keriati in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1167
  • fix: validate icons to be images by @keriati in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1173
  • Update readme.md by @Eonflip in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1186

New Contributors

  • @Eonflip made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1186

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/compare/v2.5.6...v2.5.7

entry.title: New release for Heimdall: V2.5.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix and add SVG support by @fyutins in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1222

New Contributors

  • @fyutins made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1222

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/compare/v2.5.7...V2.5.8

entry.title: New release for Heimdall: v2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add search via select2 for application dropdown by @TheDen in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1155
  • Update Laravel from 8 to 10 by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1276
  • Update php version in CI tests by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1277
  • Fix languages dropdown by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1278
  • Unable to load apps after update to Laravel 10 by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1280
  • Add missing classname by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1283
  • Add alternate tag types by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1290
  • Fix upload paths by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1291

New Contributors

  • @TheDen made their first contribution in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/compare/V2.5.8...v2.6.0

entry.title: New release for Heimdall: v2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add html5 required fields so images don't get broken when title or url are missing by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1293
  • Set the pinned attribute to true by default on items and tags by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1293
  • Add the list of tags to the application list by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1293
  • Display the homepage tag when treating tags as tags and fix associated issues with that by @KodeStar in https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/pull/1293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall/compare/v2.6.0...v2.6.1
